summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the construction and acquisition of a pipe line on East 80th Street and North 80th Street, from 12th Avenue Northeast to Greenwood Avenue, out of funds provided for in, and designating the same as one of the additions and betterments to and extensions of the existing water works system contemplated by Ordinance No. 52260, as amended by Ordinance No. 55300; and authorizing the expenditures and appropriating funds therefor.
